title: Area theorems
creator_credit: Donald Batchelor and Australian Broadcasting Commission
brief_description: Using animated shapes and the manipulation of models (translation and rotation) the facts concerning the area of the triangle, parallelogram and trapezium are demonstrated. An episode from the series “Vision in Mathematics”. Suitable for Mid-Upper Primary students.
